casebody.data:
Anthony O’Boyle, Libelant-Appellant, v. THE Steamtug VIKING, The New York Towing & Transportation Company, Claimant-Appellee. No. 222. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 17, 1930. Macklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer, of New York City (Horace L. Cheyney, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Bigham, Englar, Jones & Houston, of New York City (C. W. Hagen, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
